direction.raw_text: A blinding flash of light as the singularity explodes, particles expanding in all directions until they fill the screen, a shimmering cloud of electromagnetic dust. Then the particles start to attract one another to form atoms, the atoms elements, the elements form molecules, the molecules compounds, the compounds cells, then a cell twitches and a PRIMITIVE DRUM starts booming out a Dolby heartbeat as we witness the rapid evolution of organisms. Then a big fish swims by and is suddenly swallowed whole by a much bigger fish, and we rapidly rise from the depths and pull back to reveal--
direction.name: direction

Then a MAN rises up out of the water beside her, and staggers clumsily in the surf. Even in silhouette we can see he's far from perfect-- short, overweight. They turn to each other and embrace. It's paradise-- for him.

result.heading: DAY A TRIBE OF PRIMITIVE CAUCASIANS

direction.raw_text: . VILLAGE - DAY A TRIBE OF PRIMITIVE CAUCASIANS. Dozens of huts surround a mmunal fire pit where WOMEN in loincloths roll flatbread
direction.name: direction

The drums start pounding out a celebratory rhythm as the HUNTERS enter carrying a DEAD BOAR on a pole, their faces marked with boar's blood, ritual signs in honor of the kill. His best friend OH sits next to him sewing skins together, watching the hunters with envy, jealous of the attention they're getting from the women. If Zed is over-confident and reckless, Oh is his polar opposite, nervous and risk-averse, the kind of guy who would apologize if you poked him in the ass with your spear. He may, in fact, be near-sighted and if glasses had been invented he'd be wearing them.

direction.raw_text: Look at them. Hunters think they're so cool. They don't think gathering is dangerous? There are thorns-- bees-- those big stingy ants. I could hunt-- I just don't want to. And what's with the blood on their faces? They think that's sanitary? Official White

direction.raw_text: Oooh.                                                           - (then calls out) I'll go around! Wait for me!

direction.raw_text: ! WHAT'S GOING ON OUT THERE! Zed and Oh exchange worried looks. Then the door flies open and the SERGEANT, a huge, angry, sadistic rhino of a man, fills the door frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Who the hell screamed? They all point at Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (glowers at him) I thought it was a woman. He lumbers over and gets his face very close to Oh's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) You don't look like a woman, but maybe you want to kiss me anyway. Is that right? You want to kiss me? Oh turns away from his foul breath. The sergeant grabs Oh by the throat and practically lifts him off the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) By morning you'll be sorry you were born.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't have to wait 'til morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Why don't you pick on someone your own size? The sergeant drops Oh and turns to Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (quickly backpedaling) Which would be difficult since there are probably very few people around who actually are your size-- He smacks Zed hard on the side of the head. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to another guard) Get my big stick. I'll deal with the fat one first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relatively fat one. I wouldn't be talking about fat, if I were you. Another blow from the sergeant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Right. Enough said. The sergeant rips open Zed's shirt exposing his back, then steps up behind Oh and does the same. A guard hands him a lethal-looking bat studded with sharp spikes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Zed and Oh) Welcome to Sodom. As he takes a big backswing, Zed and Oh shut their eyes and prepare for the worst.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.C.) Stop! Zed and Oh turn to see Cain at the door, dressed like the other guards in breastplate and helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! I know these guys!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cain?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brothers!! He embraces them. They look confused and doubtful, but relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CITY STREET - NIGHT - LATER   40 Cain leads them through the narrow crowded streets. People avoid Cain's gaze and part like the Red Sea to allow him through. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you guys are lucky that sergeant is a friend of mine. I let him sodomize me once right after I got here and he's been real nice to me ever since.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, thanks for saving us. What are you going to do to us now? Cain stops and looks at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wait a second. Do I detect a tone here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, honestly? You did sell us into slavery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (instantly offended) Whoa whoa whoa! Hold a grudge much? That was like a fortnight ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was way less than a fortnight. Half a fortnight, maybe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a break! I was dealing with the death of a close family member and I needed some space. But now I realize that you guys are like my brothers. And it's so rare to find a brother that you love. Right? He embraces them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, you guys hungry? Watch this. Cain walks up to a food vendor's stall and stares menacingly at the VENDOR. He raises his fist. The vendor cowers. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (to Vendor) That's two for flinching. Cain grabs two lamb kebabs and hands them to Zed and Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) That's the kind of love I'm talkin' about. As they eat hungrily, Zed makes eye contact with a prostitute lounging in a doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check out that woman across the street! She's looking at us. The prostitute smiles at them as she sensuously peels a banana, then slides the whole thing unbroken into her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are so in! She's eye-knowing us like crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna love Sodom. Trust me. It's crazy. This morning, I almost got a handie behind that pita stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I kind of have a girlfriend-- not a girlfriend, yet, but a girl I like, so I shouldn't--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what happens in Sodom, stays in Sodom. He takes a jug of wine from the stall of a WINE MERCHANT. The merchant just bows obsequiously and keeps his mouth shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) You know, if you guys are staying you should join the guards. The pay's not great, but there's tons of perks. I'm telling you, it's the only way to go. Cain grabs a piece of candy from a SMALL CHILD and stuffs it in his mouth. The child starts crying, Cain kicks her in the ass and she runs away. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the child) Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, I'll introduce you to the captain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BARRACKS       - NEXT MORNING   41 A military drum roll and the blare of trumpets rouse the garrison. GUARDSMEN come double-timing out of the barracks and hurry to line up in formation. Last to emerge are Zed and Oh who step leisurely out the door now dressed as Royal Guards. Zed actually looks dashing, but Oh's breastplate is too big and his helmet keeps slipping down over his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is great! How do I look?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look good, but I think my hat's too big. They notice an OFFICER staring at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (to the officer) Do you happen to know where I could get a smaller hat? The officer pops him on the head with a truncheon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Line up! Zed and Oh hustle into line, orders are shouted and the troop marches off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CITY STREETS   - LATER          42 Zed and Oh are on patrol with Cain in the heart of the city. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So is this it? We just walk around?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty much. We just look for troublemakers and kick the living shit out of 'em.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of trouble?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we see a thief or a pickpocket, we just slap him around-- maybe cut off a finger or an ear, or the tip of his nose, lower lip-- anything you can just grab and slice in one fluid motion-- then we take our share of the loot and let him go. Mostly what we worry about are activist types, rabble rousers, getting people all riled up against the King or the Temple Priests. That's death for sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty harsh, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harsh times, brother. We're in the middle of a famine. People are starving. If we don't get some rain soon, it could get ugly. (looking forward to it) Then we'll get to start kicking ass big time. He stops to flog a BEGGAR with his hand out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Beat it, you filthy beggar!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't blame people for being hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, just remember, it's the palace that pays you, not the people. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Suddenly, they hear a regal fanfare of approaching trumpets and turn to look. At the sound of the trumpets EVERYONE IN THE CROWDED SQUARE falls to the ground and prostrates himself. Cain pulls Oh to the ground but Zed is left standing there oblivious as the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches. Oh taps on Zed's leg trying to get his attention, but Zed just ignores it, too transfixed to notice that he's the only one standing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: enter the square carrying an ornately decorated litter shaded with a silk canopy. On it is the PRINCESS INANNA, a stunning young woman, richly dressed and bejeweled, with exotic eyes and luscious red lips. A HANDMAIDEN rides along fanning her with a big ostrich plume fan. Zed sees the Princess and is instantly taken with her beauty. Princess Inanna glances his way and can't help but notice he's the only person in the square still standing. She gives him a quizzical smile, then turns away imperiously. As the litter passes, her handmaiden continues to stare at Zed. He doesn't recognize her, but we do. It's Maya, now elaborately costumed and made-up. Zed gawks at the Princess, then suddenly a ROYAL GUARD knocks him to the ground and stands on his neck as the rest of the entourage passes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on the ground, excitedly to Oh) Did you see that girl? I think she liked me! She looked right at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gee, I wonder why? The royal guard takes his foot off Zed's neck and they all get back to their feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who was she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Princess Inanna. She's totally hot, but don't even think about it. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because she's royalty and you're scum? The entire crowd starts moving in the same direction as the royal entourage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's everybody going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the temple. Let's go. (starts walking) You have to see this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will she be there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everybody will be there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TEMPLE SQUARE - MINUTES LATER   43 At the center of the square is a magnificent temple adorned with elaborate carvings and monumental statues of pagan gods. Before it is a great altar in front of a HUGE STONE IDOL. The idol's mouth is a gaping fiery furnace. Behind the temple, is a towering ZIGGURAT still under construction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blast a solemn fanfare as
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ceremoniously climb the stairs to the altar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stare at the spectacle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Princess Inanna takes her seat near the KING, the QUEEN, the MINISTERS and other NOBLES. Maya stands behind the Princess and continues fanning her. Zed spots the Princess on the pavilion. Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, there she is! He starts edging toward the royal pavilion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Under a broad awning, the King and Queen snack from a table covered with platters of exotic fruits and sweetmeats. The King, an imposing man with Shakespearean gravity, wipes his mouth and glances at the Princess Inanna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Princess isn't eating?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I find it hard to eat when so many are hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (as if ) Your concern is enviable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And besides, I'm so fat. The Queen,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s, still beautiful, reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (for the hundredth time) You're not fat--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I am, mother! Those new linen pants you got me from Egypt make my ass look just huge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you can't keep starving yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not? Everybody else is starving-- present company excluded. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful, Princess. You may be my step-daughter, but these are dangerous times and those are dangerous words. I weep for the suffering of my people, but the spirit of rebellion is alive in the city and if necessary I will crush it with every means at my disposal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the good of the people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (warning her) For the good of everyone who enjoys the favor of the throne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever. I'm just so incredibly bored.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fanfare climaxes as the great temple doors slowly open and the HIGH PRIEST emerges followed by a retinue of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and a dozen VESTAL VIRGINS. They walk in solemn silence to ritual positions around the altar. The High Priest is even more elaborately costumed than the nobles, ridiculously so, standing very tall on high platform shoes, with heavy eye makeup, his hair and beard even oilier than the others. He turns to the altar, raises his hands to the heavens and begins his invocation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (intoning pompously) O El, lord of Heaven and Earth; Baal, the Sublime; Shapash, goddess of the sun; Hadad, the storm god, over-ruling son of Dagon, the bountiful, god of grain, our earthly sustenance--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He makes his way to a position just below the royal pavilion and stares up at the Princess Inanna. She sees him looking at her but pretends not to notice. Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't that the idiot who was standing up in the street? Maya sees him, too, and starts fuming. The High Priest continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We come before you in humble supplication, invoking your blessing, the sweet rain which waters our fields, enriches the harvest, fills our storehouses, makes mighty the house of Ish-ka-bi- baal and the city of Sodom-- The King nods graciously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) --and feeds us, your children, with the bounty of your grace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She glances at Zed again, but this time a slight smile crosses her lips. Zed grins back at her. The Princess whispers something to her handmaiden Maya and subtly points Zed out to her. Maya nods obediently, glaring at Zed, and starts fanning the princess a little too vigorously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Accept now this humble sacrifice to the power and glory of your magnificence. He starts inspecting the Vestal Virgins, beautiful young women in diaphanous, almost transparent white gowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: have no idea what's going on. Zed turns to the GUY NEXT TO HIM. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happening?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's picking a virgin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah. Uh huh. Uh huh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the High Priest is moving down the line of beautiful young maidens. He comes to one SLUTTY GIRL who seems so obviously not a virgin, he does a double take and kicks her out of the line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watching curiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do they want a virgin for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To throw into the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (like talking to an idiot) Offering to the Gods. There's a famine going on. If we don't make a good sacrifice, it won't rain. No rain, no harvest. No harvest, no food. Get it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's pretty self-explanatory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You throw the virgin in the fire so it'll rain?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seems like a waste of a perfectly good virgin to me. Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These virgins-- it's always a girl, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A great cheer goes up as a girl is chosen. She swoons as the priestesses slip off her vestment and two priests escort her to the fiery mouth of the furnace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the love of the Gods and the glory of their Creation, the great dome of Heaven, the green growing Earth, we commit this maiden to your Holy Fire. Another great cheer from the crowd as they throw her into the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is just crazy. Maya approaches them but Zed and Oh still don't recognize her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (eyes downcast) The Princess wishes to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (staring at her cleavage) Her wish is my command.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not you. Him. (points at Zed)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? Cool. (then, motioning to Oh) We're kind of a package deal. Can he come with?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three of us are inseparable. We're like brothers. Cain squeezes both their shoulders and gives Maya an artificial smile. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Maya ignores Cain and points to Zed and Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two of you follow me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Cain) I'll try to put in a good word for you. Cain fumes as Zed and Oh head off with Maya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE   - LATER A SQUAD OF SENTRIES stands guard at the massive iron palace gates. A CROWD OF BEGGARS is pressed against the gate pleading for food. Zed and Oh approach led by Maya. The guards brutally push the beggars aside and they enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE   - COURTYARD -- CONTINUOUS Maya leads Zed and Oh through the gate and into a beautiful atrium where they are met by a fat bald EUNUCH wearing the royal livery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Oh) This is Zaftig the Eunuch. You go with him. Oh is led away by the Eunuch as she takes Zed off in the opposite direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't I go with him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? Is he your lover?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs at the thought) Hah! No? That would be weird.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Eunuch just shrugs, apparently not that weird to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (COVERING) So what do you do? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I serve the royal family-- little of this, little of that. I've been a palace eunuch since I was nine years old.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been living here since you were nine? (looks around, impressed) I should look into that. How do you get to be a eunuch?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They cut off your testicles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?! What's up with all the genital mutilation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, after a while you don't even miss them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'd miss them-- I'm sure. I hardly got to use them yet. The Eunuch leads him down the corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: land with a wet splat on a polished marble table.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: 49 A SHEEP'S HEART, LIVER AND GUTS 49

direction.raw_text: The High Priest, an extremely vain, officious, and fussy man, still over-dressed in sacramental drag, pushes back his sleeves and starts examining the entrails as the King and his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: look on, deeply concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six sacrifices in the last ten days and still no rain. What do the entrails predict? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nervously poking at the sheep heart) Well, the liver is streaked with gray-- that's not a favorable sign-- but the heart looks good. See how nice and red it is here. That's always a good omen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Usually it means that the sheep took very good care of itself, probably sticking to a high-fiber diet of grass and hay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it mean for us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it could mean either a surprise visit from a former friend or sweetheart-- or that you're going on a long sea voyage! Wouldn't that be fun?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you become High Priest?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I'm your brother?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps it's time for a new High Priest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his eyes go wide) Perhaps it's not time for a new High Priest. Aaaahh! He dramatically flings his fingers out at the Prime Minister, as if wielding the power of the Gods. Nothing happens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) And let that be a warning to you. Next time, I will hurl a lightning bolt at your face. (MORE) Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (CONSIDERS) Or a fire-ball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ignores him) Majesty, there's talk of revolution in the streets. Grain and oil are scarce, prices are high, starving peasants are pouring into the city looking for food--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Poverty has a bitter taste, but it's the flavor they were born to. It's the will of the Gods. The Queen and Princess Inanna are lounging on cushioned divans, listening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can the Gods really be so cruel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think that's cruel. It's just practical. If everybody was rich, who'd wait on us? Maya approaches and whispers something to the Princess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. See that he's bathed and dressed, then bring him to me. Maya frowns and exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (to the queen) This should be amusing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PALACE CORRIDOR - LATER   50 Maya leads Zed down a grand hallway. Zed is now wearing a long flowing robe of silk brocade, fine sandals, and jewelry. His hair has been combed and pulled back into a loose ponytail. He stops to admire himself in a mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think, ponytail or no ponytail? You know what? (MORE) Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) I'll start with the ponytail, see where the night takes me. Maya rolls her eyes and leads Zed to the entrance of the Great Hall. Cain and another guard are posted at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Hey, you made it! What's it like inside?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't know.- I'm just a guard because my "brother" didn't pull any strings with his friends in the royal court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, first of all, we're not actually brothers---
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just like Abel. I oughta just bash your head in--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! You didn't let me finish. As soon as I get in there I'm going to talk to somebody and get you invited, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure. Have a nice orgy. Cain pulls open the big doors and Zed steps through the portal. Cain tries to steal peeks inside as the heavy doors slam shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 51 A full-scale ORGY is going on in a magnificent hall. As Maya leads him into the room, Zed pulls his hair out of the ponytail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feels like a hair-down kinda scene, don't you think? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you wish. (POINTEDLY) Be sure to try the fruit. Zed looks at her and finally recognizes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maya?! What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had no choice. I'm a slave, remember?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was going to rescue you! Really! In fact, we came here to find you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not buying it) Wait here until you're sent for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This wasn't my idea, you know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not. You were just chosen again. Maybe after you and the Princess get together you can start thinking about someone beside yourself. She walks off before he can answer. Zed shakes his head, looks around the room, then STARTS walking past a row of "LIVING STATUES," semi-nude men and women on pedestals covered head to toe in gold body paint, frozen in heroic postures that show off their beautiful bodies. Zed looks closely at one beautiful nude "GODDESS", then furtively reaches out and fondles her breast. The goddess slaps his hand, then resumes her pose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watch it, jerk!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! You're a real girl! That is so cool. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He moves down the row of living sculptures, mugging at them, mock humping, and waving his hands in their faces trying to make them move, but they remain frozen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Amazing! He comes to the LAST STATUE and does a double-take. This one is wearing only a skimpy cloth diaper and is posed like someone waiting for a bus. He is also painted gold, but unlike the others, he has a little potbelly and round shoulders, and can't seem to hold still for very long, shifting his weight uncomfortably and looking around in obvious embarrassment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (recognizing him) Oh? Oh looks down from his pedestal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (through clenched teeth) I'm not supposed to talk. I'm a statue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you look so-- gold. How's it going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's it going? I just had my whole body painted by a fat guy with no balls, and believe me, he was very thorough, if you know what I mean. How's it going with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad. Had a little rub and a scrub, now I'm up for some grub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That sounds nice-- for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! You'll never guess who's here- - Maya! She's working here-- and she looks great! But she's kinda mad at me. Oh scans the great hall looking for her and spots Zed's sister Eema, his crush, come into the room carrying a tray of food. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's Eema! Eema has been beautifully groomed and is now dressed as a household slave. She stops to serve some rowdy OFFICERS who take the opportunity to tease and fondle her. She tries to pull away but Sargon, the general, grabs her arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stand still, wench! I want to see what's under that skirt. As he starts to lift her hem, she drops the whole tray of food on him. His cohorts laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry! It was an accident.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was no accident! Sargon grabs her and raises his hand to hit her. Zed steps in quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! Slave girl! (he pulls her away from
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) I told you to fetch me more wine! Apologize to this officer--- now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now go-- fetch! Wait by that-- skinny statue. I'll deal with you later. As Eema exits, Zed turns to the officers and shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Slaves-- what are you gonna do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try using a hot poker. That they understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch. Helpful hint. I will keep that in mind. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Zed bows, then leaves him and joins Eema who is waiting at Oh's pedestal. Zed                                                          (cont'd) What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were sold to the palace. But I won't serve these people! I'd rather die!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep that up and you will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here? (notices his clothes) Have you joined them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I haven't joined anything. (re the gold body paint) Does this look like fun? They both look accusingly at Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I know what you're thinking, but I'm just checking it out. We kept hearing that this place was so evil, but now that I look around I'm thinking maybe it's not all bad. There's a lot to learn here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Like human sacrifice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Like the wheel, for instance! That's pretty awesome-- the way it just goes around in a circle. And farming! And metal-- writing, money, pottery-- hot baths. Come on! Back in the village we thought sharpening a stick was a big breakthrough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Oh) What happened to him? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I think I've been chosen to do something great with my life--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here we go again--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --and I don't think it's hunting wild pigs and weaving baskets. Maya returns for Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She wants to see you-- now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you don't think I'm interested in her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would I think that? Just because you couldn't take your eyes off her--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just using her, Maya! It's part of my plan. I'm going to get you all out of here as soon as I can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your plan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not a clue) It's a secret.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (not buying it) Forget it. Maya sees A GUARD watching them and reverts to her slave attitude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (bowing to Zed) The Princess awaits you. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I await her. (to Oh and Eema) You two await me. (then confidentially to Eema and Oh) Stay out of trouble. I'll be back. He exits with Maya.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He has no idea what he's doing, does he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. So much has happened. Sometimes I think-- She walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (wistfully, to himself) I love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lounging on a divan surrounded by YOUNG MEN. Oh walks by still painted gold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Oh) You there! Golden boy! Rub me with oil. The High Priest dismisses the young men, then stands and lets his rich outer robe fall to the floor. His chest, back and shoulders are incredibly hairy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd rather not, if you don't mind. I'm not really a slave. I'm a guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then maybe you'd rather I speak to your commander and have you whipped to within an inch of your life. Or perhaps I whip you myself? How would you like that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are those my choices? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd say so. The High Priest lies back down. Oh looks around, finds a pitcher filled with precious oil and dribbles some on the High Priest's hairy chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (splashes a few more drops on him) That enough?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (getting angry) No! More oil! Much more, you insolent dolt! Oh pours oil liberally over his chest, back, and shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) That's good. Now rub it in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With my hands?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it! Oh grimaces and starts gingerly massaging the oil into his hairy chest and shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (in ecstasy) Mmmmm, I love it. The sweet scent of precious oil. The oily-- oiliness. Eema walks by with a pitcher of wine and sees Oh massaging the High Priest. She gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eema! This isn't what you think. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's fine. I understand. This really explains a lot about you that I didn't get before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, really! I'm just-- rubbing oil on this man. She exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mnum imam. I have an idea. Why don't we go back to my place and see what's under all that paint?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ughh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRINCESS'S CHAMBER - NIGHT - MINUTES LATER   53 Maya ushers Zed into the dimly lit room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She leaves him. A haze of heavily scented incense hangs in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Come to me. Zed turns and sees the Princess standing on the terrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GARDEN TERRACE - NIGHT - CONTINUOUS          54 Zed steps out onto the moonlit terrace. He crosses to the balustrade and stands beside the Princess, gazing out over the twinkling cityscape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beautiful, isn't it? You can see Gomorrah just over the hill. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know it was so close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're called the "twin cities."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks pretty from up here, but some people think God is going to wipe them out because they're so evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (toying with him) And what do you think? Am I evil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't really know you. But you don't look evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you find me attractive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, yeah. I think you're-- incredible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (moving closer) I have body issues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're perfect. Your face, your hair-- (looking into her eyes) Your eyes are like the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat) My eyes are brown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's kinda dark. I took a shot. I know they're big, though-- and wet-- She pulls him close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Can I ask you one thing? What would a girl like you want with a guy like me? Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I just find you-- interesting. They say it's the will of the gods that some men should suffer while others rule-- that we're all just victims of our fate. And I believed that until this morning when I saw you standing up, alone, in the square. And I said to myself, finally here's one man who refuses to bow down to anything--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (considers explaining but just lets it go) Yeah. That's me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, finally a man who has the courage to question the order of things--- a man chosen by the Gods to do something great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's exactly what I've been thinking! You wouldn't believe the things that have been happening to me lately. I just didn't know why.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gets very, very close) I know why. To bring you here-- to this place-- to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't agree more. I'm trying to agree more, but I can't. That's how much I agree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come. She takes his hand and leads him away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: watches them from behind a curtain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE TEMPLE - NIGHT We can see torchlight flickering inside the temple and TWO FIGURES moving among the pillars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE TEMPLE - SAME TIME   56 The High Priest is giving Oh a personal tour of the inner sanctum. Oh is scrubbed and dressed like a junior priest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My life is devoted to the service of the Gods and the good of the people. I take nothing for myself. He has a huge gold ring set with precious gems on every finger, and a gold tiara on his head studded with rubies and emeralds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's so-- unselfish of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, it is. It's just so-- lonely. Sometimes i hunger for the touch of another human being. (COY) Here's a riddle: what has two thumbs and wants another oil rub? (pointing thumbs at
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) This-guy. Ohquickly changes the subject.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So where does that hall lead to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his eyes light up) Come, I'll show you. He takes Oh's arm and leads him down the hail toward a set of incredibly impressive doors covered with cuneiform writing and arcane religious symbols.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Behind those doors is the Holy of Holies-- the earthly domain of the (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Gods-- a place so ineffably sacred, so powerful, that to enter is instant death for any mortal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. (a long beat) So who cleans it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: it needs no cleaning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, of course not. (can't let go of it) Kind of makes you wonder though-- the guys who built it, did they just die the minute they finished, or did the Gods give them a second to get out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (starting to get annoyed) I assume they finished it, then the Gods descended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that's probably it. (another long beat) So you're saying we can't go in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just told you! To enter is instant death! Only I can go in and only once a year after very elaborate purification rituals and days of special prayers and offerings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right, right, right. (BEAT) What if we just open the doors and stick our heads in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine! Enough! I'm sorry I brought it up. Let's go. (pushes Oh along) Move. Move. He shoos him down the hall. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TEMPLE   - MOMENTS LATER Zed and Princess Inanna stealthily enter the temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking around nervously) What are we doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you to enter the Holy of Holies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Finally. Now you're talking! Should I enter it right here or should we go back to your bedroom? Does the Holy of Holies like to be entered from behind or--?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the Holy of Holies-- you have to go in there and talk to the Gods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Gods are in there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So they say, but the only one who ever goes in is the High Priest. They say it's instant death for anyone else to enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then why am I going in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you were chosen? If the Gods wanted you dead they would have killed you already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what you've been chosen for! To speak to the Gods and plead with them not to destroy the city. Then come back out and tell me what it's like inside. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mulling it over) Right-- right. Then again, if the rules say--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you always follow the rules?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it with chicks always wanting guys to break the rules? You-all have this bad boy complex---- She kisses him fiercely on the lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do this for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going in. He enters the Holy of Holies. A FIGURE darts between the columns and hides in the shadows. A beam of moonlight reveals the mark of Cain on his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HOLY OF HOLIES   - CONTINUOUS   58 Zed steps into the chamber and immediately prostrates himself, face down on the floor, arms outstretched in supplication. He lies there with his eyes tightly shut, expecting to be vaporized any second. A long moment passes in total silence. Then he opens his eyes and looks around tentatively. The inner chamber of the Holy of Holies is a bare room with marble walls lit only by shafts of moonlight from skylights above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (takes a deep breath and starts improvising) Thank you, O-- Merciful ones, for-- not like-- killing me, and letting me receive the, uh, blessing of your holy-- godliness. He exhales and closes his eyes again, waiting for some divine response. Nothing comes. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (props himself up on his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) Okay, I don't know the right words-- so I'm just going to say what I have to say-- if that's all right. (waits for a response, gets none, proceeds) I know I haven't always done the right thing. Eating the fruit was bad, I know that-- and the Cain thing-- and I have done somethings with women-- I do love the ladies-- well, you probably know all that because you're watching everything-- (a thought occurs) Do you really watch everything? That's got to be a little disgusting sometimes-- but probably pretty hot, too-- (QUICKLY) Not that you would get off on any of it-- okay, I'm getting off the subject. Anyways, the word is you've been considering destroying this place. So I'm asking you not to-- as a personal favor. (NOTHING) Feel free to jump in anytime. I could use a little guidance here. Still no response. He rolls over onto his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Look, I know you think this place is evil and it kinda is-- I see that-- but that's not everybody. There are a lot of good people, too. So what if there were, like, fifty really good people? Would you still destroy the city? (SILENCE) Okay, you're right, that may be a reach. How about twenty? I could probably get you twenty extremely good people if I really looked around. (SILENCE) How about five? Five awesome people-- including myself. I personally know at least five people worth saving. Does that sound good? (MORE) Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (NOTHING) Hello? A little help? Am I getting warm here? Okay, is it me? Are you punishing me for stuff I did? (an insight) Or setting me up for what I need to do. Or both! Or neither? (NOTHING) Could you give me some kind of a sign-- please-- anything? Zed listens but hears only a profound silence. Then a revelation. He sits up on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Okay, wait. Is that the sign? The silence? Is that it? (waits for confirmation) It is, isn't it! Just this really silent-- silence. (PONDERING) You're not going to tell me what to do; it's up to me to decide what's right and what's wrong-- right? Is that it? You're not going to speak to me-- you're going to speak through me? If that's right, don't say anything. (listens for a beat) Okay, I read you loud and clear. Thank you. (an afterthought) Oh, and if things don't work out with Maya would it be okay with you if me and the Princess had a little "carnal knowledge"? Not in an evil way or anything-- (he listens; silence) Okay! You're right, probably not a good idea. Thank you. He backs out of the Holy of Holies, bowing all the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE TEMPLE - CONTINUOUS The doors to the Holy of Holies opens and Zed comes backing out, still bowing and muttering. Then he turns and his face falls. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The High Priest, the King, the Queen, and a dozen Temple Acolytes are staring at him in amazement. Oh stands beside the High Priest dressed just like him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was just looking for the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told him not to go in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seize them!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (scared, points at Zed) Seize him! The guards arrest Oh as Cain steps up and takes hold of Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should've invited me to the party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DUNGEON - MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT In the dim torchlight, we see Zed hanging spread-eagle five feet off the ground, his arms and legs stretched out wide and tightly bound to iron rings imbedded in the stone. Oh is shackled to the wall beside him, hanging upside down. They hear the faint scream of a man being tortured somewhere deep in the prison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish I was upside down. Looks fun. Oh won't talk to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) So this is it? We're not friends anymore? After all I've done for you? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What have you done for me? I've been attacked by a cougar, I've fallen down a mountain, I almost had the tip of my thingy cut off, I've been greasing up the High Priest all night, and now I'm hanging upside down in a dungeon. And I have to pee real bad. All because of you. You call yourself a friend? Name one good thing you've done for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've helped you come out of your shell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in distress) I really have to pee--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, I know I'm not perfect, and I may have made a few wrong turns, but you have to understand-- I'm a chosen. That's a lot of responsibility -- you can't even imagine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only one who thinks you're chosen is you, so shut up already!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, be mad, but I'm going to get us out of here, if it's the last thing I do. Zed starts frantically yanking on his shackles to no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) That was just my first idea-- and I'm also accepting ideas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guard! I have to pee! Now! Seriously! (can't hold it anymore) Oh, no-- Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Because he's upside down, the streams runs down his stomach, over his chest, down his neck, onto his chin and over his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) I hate you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PUBLIC SQUARE - EARLY MORNING A curious, jeering MOB is gathering as Zed and Oh, in shackles, are led by a SQUAD OF GUARDS to a raised platform in the middle of the square. The heavy pounding of martial drums silences the crowd. Cain presides over the execution. He addresses the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the crimes of blasphemy-- (the crowd grumbles its
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grumble, grumble)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (serious grumbling)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (admiring oohs and aahs) And the murder of my brother Abel--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up! For these and other crimes they may not actually have done yet but we're pretty sure they were thinking about, the prisoners will be stoned to death. The crowd roars as GUARDS stationed around the square pull canvas covers off big baskets of rocks and the people rush to grab stones to throw. Zed and Oh instinctively move closer to each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The King, Queen, High Priest and Royal Ministers observe the stoning from their vantage point above the square. Princess Inanna refuses to look. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Observe, my dear. It seems the least you could do, since it was you who lured him to his death. She reluctantly turns and looks at Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't intend for this to happen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The people move in and surround the platform on all sides, baseball-size rocks in their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Zed and Oh) Anything to say before the sentence is carried out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the crowd) I just want to say this is really messed up--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: STONE THEM! The people fling their rocks with all their might. Zed and Oh duck. The rocks fly over their heads and hit people in the crowd on the opposite sides, several bystanders taking painful hits in the head, some falling down unconscious. Cain notes the impracticality of having people throw rocks from all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Okay! Stop! Halt! Hold it! This isn't working.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I make a suggestion?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you just pick one person to throw? The crowd thinks that's not a bad idea and murmurs agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (pressing the advantage) In fact, don't you think it would be fair for us to get to pick the person who stones us? Cain looks doubtful, but the crowd thinks this is eminently fair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (some eagerly raising their hands and waving like school children) Yes! Ooh, me! Pick me! Me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The King grabs Sargon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re Cain) What is that idiot doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed spots a good candidate in the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We pick him! Cain points at a BIG GUY, heavily muscled, eagerly waving his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, next to him! He points at a BOY, about nine years old and not very big.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's just a kid! Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? You got something against kids? Zed plays the crowd which starts booing in disapproval.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) This guy hates kids!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! What's he got against kids? Children are the future! Give the kid a shot! The kid! The kid! On the balcony, the King shifts uncomfortably, intimidated by the power of the mob. He nods to Sargon who signals to Cain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right! All right! We'll try it. Kid! Grab a rock. The boy picks up a good-size rock. Zed turns to Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good thinking, huh? They turn to face the boy, ready to dodge when he throws. The boy winds up and fires a major league fastball that smacks Oh right on the forehead. The crowd cheers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Holy shit! That kid's got an arm!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think he hit me. The boy fires again. Oh spins and tries to duck but takes the rock right on the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Hey! There's two of us! The crowd cheers and pats the kid on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, everybody on this side now! On the count of three! One-- two-- Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! I have a question for the King! The crowd goes silent. All eyes turn and look up to the palace balcony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (shouts to the King) Why didn't I die in the Holy of Holies? On the balcony, everyone is totally stopped by his question. One by one they all look to the High Priest who seems to be stumped. In the square, the crowd starts muttering. Zed seizes the initiative.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) I entered the Holy of Holies and, lo, I did not die! Why? Because I am chosen by the Gods!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is chosen! He is the Chosen One. The Chosen One! Zed gives Oh a look: "See? I told you."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (starts chanting) Spare the Chosen One! Spare the Chosen One! Spare the Chosen One!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And his friend! Don't forget his friend! On the balcony, the King and his ministers hastily confer with the High Priest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could it be? Is he truly chosen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't-- I suppose it's possible- I'd have to examine some new
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Imbecile! Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Majesty, with respect, whether he's chosen or not is no longer the issue. To kill him now, given the public mood, could inflame the situation enough to prompt a radical "regime change," if you take my meaning. The King looks grimly at his ministers, all of whom have lean and hungry looks. Princess Inanna smiles contemptuously at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: addressing the crowd in the square.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By order of the King, the sentence has been commuted. The crowd cheers. Zed and Oh exchange hopeful looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't we just stone them a little?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is the judgement of our most merciful King that the prisoners are to be enslaved to toil at hard labor until they die of exhaustion or starvation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (exuberant fist pump) Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE ZIGGURAT - DAY   63 Oh is up to his knees in a mud pit, trampling straw into the thick mud. A Guard cracks a bullwhip which flicks painfully across his shoulders. Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you think that actually makes anybody work harder? It just makes them resent you. Is that what you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whips him again) Faster!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I just ask when lunch is? The whip lashes out again. Oh glowers at him and steps up the pace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marlak and Enmebaragesi are stacking bricks when zed approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (greets them) Hey! Boys! Long time no see. They glance up, but ignore him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Don't tell me you're still mad about Maya. That's so over. I have a thing going with the princess now-- well, almost had a thing. I'm a slave now-- just like you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You're not just like me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. We do have our differences-- like about a cup and half of brain tissue-- but that doesn't mean we can't work together. Another GUARD approaches and whacks Marlak with his stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 Take those bricks to the top. The masons are waiting. Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Marlak and Enmebaragesi glower at the guard as they pick up ropes and harness themselves to a cart loaded with bricks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2                                                      (cont'd) (to Zed) You! Help them! He grabs another rope harness off the cart and throws it to Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I'd like to, but I did something to my neck-- (massages his neck) I must've slept on it funny-- those dungeon pillows are like rocks-- well, they are rocks-- so I should probably take it easy or I'll be no damn good for work tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 (strikes him across the back with his stick) I said move!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! But I should tell you, this isn't really my area. I'm just on a break from the mud department-- The Guard draws his short sword and raises it over Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 One more word and you die--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (putting on the harness) Okay, okay. I'm going. (to Marlak and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) Okay, boys, on the count of three. One-- two-- three! Marlak and Enmebaragesi lunge against the ropes, but Zed makes no effort to pull. They glare at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Learned that from Maya. Good trick, huh? Okay, together this time. Go! Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They pull together and the heavy cart starts to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TOP OF THE ZIGGURAT - LATER   65 Zed, Marlak and Enmebaragesi haul the heavy cart of bricks to the very top of the tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are working on the wall. Zed leans against the wall next to them tb rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How high you guys think we're going with this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up to Heaven, I guess. That's how tall they usually build 'em.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking up) That's ambitious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We worked on the Tower of Babel. Now that was a ziggurat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Incredible erection. Zed looks down at his crotch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's nothing. You should see it when I'm excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, right, the tower. Incredible erection. (snickers to himself)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, the Egyptians are working on an entirely different concept. Four sides, slanting walls, pointy top. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a pyramid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. Far out. Yet timeless in a way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches with a water bucket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Zed) Want some water? As the child offers him the ladle, Zed recognizes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're from the village, aren't you? The child nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) I bet you wish you were back there right now, don't you. The child nods again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Well, don't give up. You're going to get home someday. Marlak kicks Zed from behind, knocking him over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (standing over him) Who's going to take her there? The Chosen One? Marlak kicks gravel and dirt in Zed's face. Zed just lies there and takes it, feeling like he's failed everyone. Then he hears the beating of drums and trumpet fanfares coming from the temple square below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE MUD PITS   - SAME TIME   66 Oh and the other slaves are mustered by the guards. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get in line! Now! Move!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where're we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To watch the sacrifice. The King demands it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that compulsory? Because I saw one when I first got here and it made me a little sick-- The guard's whip catches him across the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Ow! Why don't you try using your words for a change?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TEMPLE SQUARE - CONTINUOUS   67 The square is filling up with people. The ROYAL PROCESSION is moving to the seats of honor to watch the sacrifice. Cain is now among the Royal Guard having been promoted for his treachery. He bows and helps the Queen to her seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (leering seductively) At your service, my lady. Anytime, anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a depraved thought. You're so delightfully low. Absolute filth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, your majesty. He touches his tongue to the tip of his nose and waggles his eyebrows. The King arrives with Sargon to loud booing from the crowd. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are they booing me? How dare they!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Highness, with all due respect, those were "Woos." They love you. They were "wooing" you. The King looks doubtfully at the hostile crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All is in readiness, Majesty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (glares at the King) What now? More virgins to sacrifice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, two, followers of the Chosen One, discovered by this loyal soldier. Cain bows to the King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just doing my duty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And one more to demonstrate our own faith and charity. The King stands and makes a proclamation loud enough for everyone to hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) In supplication to the Gods, for the love of the People, we offer a humble sacrifice to the sacred temple fire-- our own step- daughter, the Princess Inanna! The crowd gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (to Inanna) For the good of the people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stands in protest) You wouldn't dare! Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wouldn't I? If you like, I could arrange for you to join her. The Queen slowly sits back down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (to Inanna) How long did you think I'd tolerate your insolence? (to Sargon) Burn her.- Sargon and Cain seize Inanna, but she shrugs them off and rises with dignity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see you all in Hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The flames are starting to build inside the idol's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TEMPLE SQUARE - SAME TIME   69 Oh and the slaves are confined behind a barrier, watched by a squad of guards, waiting for the ceremony to start.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: open slowly, and the High Priest appears holding a long jewelled staff. Oh turns to the EDOMITE SLAVE next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (casually name-dropping) See the High Priest? I know him. Dear friend of mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now the procession of SACRIFICIAL VIRGINS is led out by the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Maya and Eema are among them, their hands tied. They look like they've been drugged. Oh spots Eema and Maya among the virgins. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's Eema! And Maya! I know them!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess you know everybody, don't you. Oh shoulders his way right up to the barrier where a BIG GUARD stops him with a spear to his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's far enough, slave. Oh stops right there, frustrated and frightened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Inanna is led out last, now also having been drugged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed, Marlak and the sharp-eyed Enmebaragesi look down, trying to see what's going on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're bringing out the women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you seeing that far?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see your sister, Eema--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Maya!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The drums and trumpets kick up the tempo and the High Priest starts leading the virgins to the idol's fiery mouth. Oh pushes against the barrier, restrained by the guard. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to do something! Somebody has to stop it. (turning to the other
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ) We can't let them do this! The slaves start to mutter. The guards draw their swords and heft their spears, now on high alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed looks around desperately, trying to figure out what to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Marlak) I have to get down there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 (SNORTS) Over my dead body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. Without a moment's hesitation, Marlak grabs him and tosses him off the top of the ziggurat. He screams all the way down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. Who saw that coming? Thanks, Marlak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what? Zed looks around quickly, grabs the end of a long coiled rope attached to a big pulley, and hands Marlak the other end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looping the rope around his waist) Lower me down. Without waiting for a response, Zed bravely jumps off the top of the ziggurat holding the rope. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Marlak looks at the rope in his hands, pulls it a little and sees that it's not attached to the rope Zed was holding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's descending rapidly, rappelling off the side of the ziggurat. He looks up, expecting Marlak to belay him and slow him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any time now, Marlak! Marlak and Enmebaragesi watch his descent, dumbly interested in what happens next. Zed sees he's not slowing down and tries to swing himself onto one of the upper levels of the ziggurat. However, when he swings in, he hits a cart loaded with bricks and bounces off painfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sudden jolt dislodges the wheel chock that was holding the cart on the sloping ramp of the tower. The cart starts to roll down the ramp, gathering speed as it careens toward the edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He raises his staff and invokes the Gods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We implore the great Gods of heaven to show us a sign that we may honor your divine will and be worthy of your blessing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The brick cart explodes through the scaffolding on the side of the ziggurat and sails into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everybody turns at the sound of the crash and looks up at the ziggurat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The NASTY GUARD who whipped Oh earlier glances up and is instantly crushed by a ton of falling bricks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed is still descending as the broken scaffolding starts to give way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The whole crowd watches in amazement as the 250                 foot scaffolding slowly collapses and crashes to the ground, bringing tons of debris with it, sending up a great cloud of dust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He seizes the opportunity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A sign! It's a sign! The Chosen One comes! The other slaves and people in the crowd pick up his excitement. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Chosen One! A sign from the Gods!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't quite know how to respond to the growing fervor of the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Well and truly, the Gods are with us-- The crowd drowns him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A guard is standing there staring at the rubble of the scaffolding as Zed comes screaming down the side of the ziggurat and lands right on top of him. Zed quickly strips the unconscious guard of his weapons, starts to run off, stops, comes back and grabs the guard's helmet, then takes off running to the temple square.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The High Priest is getting frantic now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Burn them! Now! He grabs Maya and starts dragging her toward the gaping mouth of the idol and the raging fire within. She struggles but is too drugged to put up much resistance. He grabs the sacramental pitcher of oil and starts sloppily anointing her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (RUSHING) May the balm of this healing oil soothe your journey through the sacred fire! (DESPERATELY) Don't fight it! It's the will of the Gods! Then, a voice from above. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so! Zed is standing atop the idol's head, brandishing a sword and shield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sees him and starts to revive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zed!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks up, unable to hear Zed over the crowd noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cupping his ear) What did you say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said, 'I don't think so!'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shakes his head) Still not getting it. Zed rolls his eyes in frustration and starts tentatively climbing down from the top of the idol. He jumps the last few feet and lands right in front of the fire, blocking the High Priest's way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Said, 'I don't think so.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't think what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever that last thing you said was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I forgot. (SHOUTS) Guards! Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Guards rush toward Zed from all sides, but he fights like a demon, slashing, spinning, stabbing, fending off their blows with his shield. Oh is inspired by Zed's courage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Edomite slave) I know him, too. Oh springs into action, attacking the big guard in front of him. The other slaves see that and start fighting with their guards, a genuine slave revolt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guards start moving to help their comrades, but the spirit of insurrection takes hold of the crowd and people start grappling with the guards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes double-timing into the square. Suddenly, A STOOPED OLD MAN throws off his cloak and pulls a sword. It's Abraham!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Death to the idolators! Abraham's small army of HEBREWS reveal themselves, draw their weapons and attack the reinforcements. The last Hebrew to unrobe is Isaac, who just stands there observing the growing chaos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his head) Just fucking nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They come running into the battle swinging clubs, randomly bashing heads of soldiers and innocent civilians alike. Cain sees Marlak and stands his ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tough guy, huh? You want a piece of me? Get ready to have your head bashed in! Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As Cain raises his truncheon, Marlak HEAD-BUTTS him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (nose bleeding, stunned) Nice move! He passes out and goes down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He starts to panic at the full-scale revolt and rises nervously. His ministers surround him, he thinks to protect him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew I could depend on your loyalty. The ministers all draw daggers from their robes and move in for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (MUTTERS) Assholes. He falls to their flashing knives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh fights his way to the temple stairs, runs up and confronts a PRIEST who is trying to drag Eema away. He fights with very little skill but tremendous energy, finally overwhelming the guard and grabbing Eema.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (suddenly shy again) Hello, Eema.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still a little dazed) Oh? He stares at her full red lips and big blue eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (suddenly forceful) Eema, you're my woman! You hear me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? It's okay? He pulls her into an embrace and kisses her hard on the mouth. Then, out of the corner of his eye, Oh sees a guard rushing at him. Oh whirls and falls off the platform, accidentally cutting the guards legs out from under him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While Zed is busy with the guards, the High Priest pulls Maya toward the fire. Zed sees him, finishes the last of the guards, and starts slowly moving toward the High Priest who starts backing away until he sees Oh moving toward him from the other side. He holds the helpless Maya close to the flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screaming and crying) Keep away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his mascara running) No! The Gods demand a sacrifice! And you ruined it! He wrestles Maya even closer to the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to keep him calm) Why don't we just sacrifice something small-- a rabbit maybe. Or a duck. That'd be good, don't you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! A duck would not be good!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (U.S.) Then how about this? The High Priest turns to Oh. Oh is holding the big sacramental pitcher.
direction.name: direction
