direction.raw_text: (cont'd) More oil? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He splashes the High Priest with a gallon of oil, soaking him from head to toe. As the oil hits the High Priest, Zed dashes across and snatches Maya from his grasp. The High Priest spins around in a rage, his long robes wrap around his legs hobbling him, he totters on his high platform shoes, loses his balance and gets too close to the idol's fiery mouth. Totally drenched in oil, he bursts into flame like a human torch, screams, and staggers right into the mouth of the furnace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone goes silent, stunned by the incredible turn of events. All eyes turn to Zed and Oh, now standing before them on the center stage of the temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They look at each other. Someone has to say something. Finally, Zed clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the, uh, Chosen One, I guess, and on behalf of, well, the whole city, I want to thank the High Priest for his incredible sacrifice. That was really something, wasn't it? He starts clapping, then Oh starts clapping, and soon all the people in the square are applauding. At that moment a single drop of rain falls and hits Zed in the eye. He looks up, a few more drops, then a hard steady rain starts to fall. The people all look up in awe, then someone cheers and they all roar in celebration. Then the rain stops as suddenly as it started. The cheers die away, and confused, dissatisfied muttering begins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (jumping in quickly) People! Friends! Sodomites! Okay, that was a little confusing, wasn't it? (MORE) Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Was that a sign from God? Wasn't it a sign? What's the deal? We all want to know. But I'm not sure anybody really knows-- and I'd be real suspicious of people who say they do. If I've learned one thing, it's this: the world and everything in it is a miracle. And what that miracle means is for each and every one of us to figure out for himself. Are the Gods going to destroy us? Maybe-- I don't know-- I guess it's possible. But if we keep going the way we are, they won't have to. We're doing a pretty good job of destroying ourselves. So maybe we should all just go home now, and think about what happened-- and be very, very good to each other. I know I'm going to try. (raises his hand in salute to the people) Peace. The crowd stares at him blankly. Nobody knows what to make of it all. Then Marlak shouts loud enough for all to hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All hail the Chosen One! With that the crowd explodes into rousing cheers. In the midst of the crowd, Abraham looks around and scowls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I? Chopped liver? At the altar, Maya, revived now, embraces Zed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're incredible, you know that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I've been trying to tell you. Zed and Maya, Oh and Eema stand there basking in the gratitude of the people as Inanna looks on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Official white
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GATES OF THE CITY - A FEW DAYS LATER   81 A caravan is assembling, making ready to leave the city. Marlak, Enmebaragesi, Maya, Eema and the other villagers are there, as well as a great number of freed slaves and Hebrews. Isaac is checking out Maya's breasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, babe. Ever made it with a circumcised guy? Marlak grunts at him and reaches for his knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (BACKPEDALING) Is she with you? I did not realize that. Sorry. Marlak and Maya cross to Zed who is loading a packhorse. Marlak looks at him for a long moment then punches him hard on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did good. Zed waits for more, but nothing comes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (rubbing his shoulder) Well said, Marlak. You really have a way with words. They clasp hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll tell stories about you around the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not much to tell, is there? Just an average guy who saw his destiny and had the courage to defy a powerful empire. No big deal. Oh is at the front of the caravan, giving orders, but no one is listening to him. Zed joins him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) Everybody ready? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, just about-- I guess so. The Hebrews are going to lead us to the sea and we can get boats from there. We can trade all this stuff everybody gave us for the trip home. (NERVOUS) I don't think I should be the leader. Nobody's listening to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (by his side) I'll listen to you. Oh swells up with pride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turns to Zed) Come back to the village sometime. Zed nods, they shake hands, then they embrace. Stifling a tear, Oh breaks away and whips the lead camel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) (shouting at camel) Hee-ya! (beat, quietly to camel) Come on. People are watching. The camel looks at him and slowly lumbers off. Oh sighs gratefully and signals the caravan to follow. As the great caravan moves off, Zed is left standing there with nothing but a long staff, and a bundle on the ground beside him to which is tied his sword, shield and helmet. Maya joins him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where will you go now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Might head down to Egypt. I hear it's a happening kinda place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you going alone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not necessarily. You want to come? Official White
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll get my things. She gestures off and he sees a small train of camels and horses loaded with a ton of her personal possessions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) The Princess gave me a few gifts when she freed us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Traveling light, huh? Okay, here we go. (POINTS) To the west!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (correcting him) That's west.
direction.name: direction
